meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ron White Marie Corfield Brooks Moore Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4008.

td.p: Ron White, a network engineer from Cary, North Carolina
Marie Corfield, an art teacher from Flemington, New Jersey
Brooks Moore, an emergency medicine resident from Avondale Estates, Georgia (whose 1-day cash winnings total $17,601)

tr.td: STATUES
HOW...?
VARIETY HEADLINES
SOUNDS GOOD TO ME
YOU'VE GOT GREAT "LEG"s
TANKS!

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Ron: Who is Eve?)

Venus de Milo

BrooksRon
')
